channel.title: Project508 EXP Rate
channel.description:
Okay i wanted to go ahead and ask this now I'm making a "some what" replica of RS i want the training to be a little easier if that is possible so i was wanting to know if there's a way i could make it were when they hit like lets say a 1 or it gives more exp, i don't need to know this yet till i get monsters to train on but i was just wanting to know if there's a way be for i get my hopes up
-Project508
Edit: im running on palido74
